reference:
FIRST DIVISION
[ G.R. NO. 137447, January 31, 2005 ]
ROBERT VENERACION, PETITIONER VS. PEOPLE OF THE PHILIPPINES, RESPONDENT.
DECISION AZCUNA, J.:
Before us is a petition for review on certiorari of the Decision
[1]
of the Court of Appeals in CA-G.R. No. 14512, dated August 31, 1998, in favor of the People of the Philippines, against herein petitioner Robert Veneracion, and its Resolution, dated February 1, 1999, denying the motion for reconsideration.
